```{r setup, include=F}
library(lubricity)
```

```{r}
df <- read.delim(system.file("extdata", "feature.tsv", package = "lubricity"))
df.country <- unique(df$country)
df.country <- lapply(unique(df$country), adminify_delim, delim = "[:,]")
data.frame(do.call(rbind, df.country))
```
